definition: relative position of exhibition booth/allocated floor space for display stall/allotted exhibit area
to spread out/to open up/to exhibit/to put into effect/to postpone/to prolong/exhibition
position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential

sentences.english: The balance shall be paid 45 days before the opening of the trade fair.
sentences.chinese: 剩余展位费在博览会开幕前45天内付清。

sentences.english: Under such circumstances, the Canton Fair booth price even higher than the number of international exhibitions.
sentences.chinese: 这样来说，广交会的展位价格甚或高于一些国际展会。

sentences.english: Raw Space Exhibitors have to carpet, design and construct their own floor space.
sentences.chinese: 展览光地参展商须自行设计及盖建展位，并铺上地毯。

sentences.english: The Porsche stand at the IAA Motor Show , held in Berlin in September 1951.
sentences.chinese: 1951年9月德国法兰克福车展上的保时捷展位。

sentences.english: And then we can go and look at the other stands and the conference hall.
sentences.chinese: 然后再去看看其他展位和会议大厅。

sentences.english: Organization of 257 companies in our province, a total of 646 booths.
sentences.chinese: 我省组织了257家企业参展，共有展位646个。

sentences.english: No painting or wallpapering of the wall panel is allowed.
sentences.chinese: 不得在展位墙板上涂刷油漆或黏贴墙纸。

sentences.english: You could try that stand over there.
sentences.chinese: 你可以去那边的展位问一下。

sentences.english: But still, the booths were packed.
There is no entry fee in exhibition area and trading area.
sentences.chinese: 展区与交易区免收展位费和会务费。

sentences.english: And the ENEA display is always worth a look.
sentences.chinese: 并且欧洲核能机构的展位也非常值得一看。

sentences.english: Built in and portable loudspeakers , operated from the control booth above the meeting rooms.
sentences.chinese: 内置和便携式扬声器，操作控制展位以上的会议室。

sentences.english: You need to counterbalance the design and color with neutral shades for the furniture.
sentences.chinese: 展位内家具需要用中性色调来平衡设计和颜色。

sentences.english: And the total booth fee for the package stand should be paid off in one time.
sentences.chinese: 标准展位参展商须一次性付清全部展位费。

sentences.english: And the total booth fee for the package stand should be paid off in one time.
sentences.chinese: 标准展位参展商须一次性付清全部展位费。

sentences.english: All rights reserved by Nanjing Ningfei int'l Exhibition Co. , Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 南京宁菲国际展览有限公司保留对本展位图的修改权。

definition: to exhibit at or take part in a trade show etc
to display and sell (e.g. at a fair)/sales exhibition
meeting place/place where people gather/CL:個|个[ge4]
to put on display/to be on show/to exhibit
China Export Commodities Fair also known as the Canton Fair
